comments.body: since I'm working on the dash updates with this feature, I'm including a service health tile update to include the CloudFormations service.

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1305

This can be code reviewed/merged, but pass to [~jloza] for UX review with me after she returns. I know there's work there.
Can't complete UX review until create stack works

awesome start! Reviewed in Master branch. 

global: H-rules appear too wide here, see instance detail page for how they should be. Also there are whitespace issues, I may need to fiddle with that stuff with [~kgill].

breadcrumb:
* "Stacks" should be plural

General tab, stack section:
* I don't see the status reason, is that just because the stack is in create complete state?

Tags section:
* the name of this stack is "withtags" but I don't see any tags, is that working OK?

Outputs section:
* column width does not seem wide enough for key
* no description column

Resources section:
* table extends beyond container, may need to expand container
* timestamp instead of description column, can you not get description? AWS can. 
* Status does not include color coding, and is in codespeak instead of english
* physical ID does not appear to be link but I thought you linked those? 

Events tab:
* missing status reason again
* may need to widen container to make everything fit, may need to move help to the bottom ([~kgill] this may need to be done globally)
* table (may be global) header should be fixed and not scroll, only data rows should scroll ([~kgill])
* again, expected physical ID to be link
* status should have color and be english

I never saw status reason reported by our API results, so that's why I never show it.

Screen shot shows tags listed. Are you not seeing that?
On the output section, it shows key/values returned by API call. (see sample response here: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeStacks.html)

pls test on GUI-1488 branch. It has all the latest and may explain some of what you saw.

thanks!

* horizontal rules are still full width between sections, should not be.
* key column width in output section still seems too narrow, is that auto-adjusting to the length of the longest key or something (which would be OK, just need to know) (yes, auto-adjusting)
* still missing description columns, may be back end bug, if you want to write a separate ticket for that I can move this one along when done, although I hate to do that because it makes extra busywork for QA.  (no description in Output values.. where have you seen that in the API? Do you want me to pull that from the template? There isn't much space... use hover?)
* statuses should be sentence case, please (done)
* events tab: can you put the sticky thing on the table header please? (done)
* status: in progress does not have a dash, please (fixed)
I notice horizontal rules in user detail page also full width. something globally changed? Let's wait till foundation update to tweak.
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1331

stack section:
* labels do not appear to have correct class applied (done)
* labels should be right-justified (done)

all tabs
* sections should start under actions menu, not aligned with it
* horizontal rules shoudl not be black, IDK if this is a CSS issue or the wrong class is applied. [~kgill] (they aren't.. they are $euca-grey)

general:
* columns in tag and output table should be the same width. They look weird next to each other (controlled by content. I changed both to say "key/value" so if no values, they line up. We could force width, but may wrap more than necessary... advise)

parameters:
can we do these as labels and values like we do parm elsewhere? There is no need for this to be a table.  (done)

what is up with the status descriptions? Have you gotten an answer back from [~ethomas] on whether we support that? They are shown in the AWS console.
I've addressed your items in the GUI-1489 branch. Events table now has status reason.

do not see status reason in events table in 1489 branch. Please check work carefully and resubmit when you're sure all teh issues I;ve asked you to address are actually addressed, please. using chrome. 

Also, can you not get description on outputs as well? AWS shows them. We may need to open a back end ticket, please advise us on implementation [~ethomas]. 

Stopping review at this point, did not review anything else.

[~dkavanagh]: I've reviewed PR 1331 and am disappointed in the amount of invalid HTML added in that PR.  Please consider opening the files in PyCharm (even if you don't use that as your primary editor) to highlight those errors.  I also suggest using an HTML reference such as https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Reference

/cc [~jloza]

[~dkavanagh] even though we discussed making this ticket an exception to the general process and merging before all UX issues are addressed to get the selenium fixes in, it sounds like the code needs too much work to do that. Please just go ahead and get this to the point of passing UX review (and fix the issues [~kgill] is already seeing in the code) prior to submitting for code review. We'll just stick to the normal process here. The sooner you can get the UX stuff in shape and get the code review passed, the sooner it can be merged. 

Sounds like the selenium fixes need to be in a separate branch.

I fixed the code-review soon after they were reported and I also updated the menu to remove the drop-down since there were some styling issue with the drop-down I could avoid by simply switching to the off-canvas menu as you wanted. The tests are all functional here as well.
[~dkavanagh]: Both [~jloza] and I have made it clear that the selenium nav fixes, which have nothing to do with GUI-1489, should be pulled out of PR 1331 and fixed in a distinct branch.
[~jloza] As far as I know, outputs honor "description" tags and return them among the describe-stacks command.  Please let me know if this is otherwise.

[~kgill], [~jloza], GUI-1474 is there with just the test updates. Though, I'm surprise other PRs off master have passed CI, so I created a PR to specifically test CI on master.
I've also addressed the list of UX concerns above and will create a new PR for this ticket once tests have merged.
I think we should be fixed up now. I also updated the nav to use overlap. feel free to ask for a screen-share anytime if you'd like to discuss some tweaks.
[~dkavanagh], did you see [~ethomas]'s comment above about the output descriptions? Were you able to retrieve those?

[~ethomas] Was the description on outputs added more recently? Our cloud could be out of date. Here's what the DescribeStacks API call returns:

<Outputs><member><OutputKey>URL</OutputKey><OutputValue>https://withtags-ConsoleEL-HY2NMCVWDKTXL-827379074989.lb.g-08-08.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com</OutputValue>

cc: [~jloza]
[~dkavanagh] It appears that I was wrong.  Outputs do not return descriptions.  I will investigate.
[~dkavanagh] this is a good opportunity to try out the new flow for submitting cross cutting tasks, why don;t you submit a ticket for this? It can get scrubbed at the bug scrub tomorrow.

[~jloza], [~ethomas],
In spite of the Docs from AWS, they do seem to supply Description for output values. I just tested against AWS. I'll open a ticket.

        <Outputs>
          <member>
            <OutputValue>http://ec2-54-176-64-241.us-west-1.compute.amazonaws.com</OutputValue>
            <Description>Drupal Website</Description>
            <OutputKey>WebsiteURL</OutputKey>
          </member>
        </Outputs>
[~dkavanagh], what branch should I be reviewing this on?

Oh, sorry. I didn't mention because it's the same branch (GUI-1489)
Can always check PRs to see if there's a branch with the same name: https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pulls

Getting there!

General tab:
* Stack section, assume padding will be worked out in another ticket (yes)
* Stack section, too much whitespace between label and value (done)
* Stack section: I see a green thing briefly as the page loads in the status area. then it changes to the actual status. What is that green thing and can you get rid of it? (done)

Template tab:
* same issue with too much whitespace between labels and values (done)
* not enough whitespace between template description row and h-rule below it, see other tab for example (done)

Events tab:
* assume alignment issues on events page will be fixed with widening of container fix (yes)
* MSB should be full-width of the container here (done)
* colors for various events do not match wireframe (should match landing page as well, see landing page wireframe for details, ask if you have questions (done)
General notes:
* actions menu does not have any options, should have "Delete" (it does, but you need to click top or right edge till spacing fix goes in)
changes pushed to GUI-1489 branch

UX review passed, may need to adjust width of MSB on events tab once other branches are merged. Ready for code review. There are lots of small things that are broken, I think until we get the majority of the branches that make global changes merged.

Verified all sections.
